sentences.en: Conclusion: FO of falsetto highest voice reduces , falsetto voice become thin in pathological voice.
sentences.cn: 结论: 病态嗓音的假声最高音基频下降,假声音域变窄.

sentences.en: He lowered the level of his incongruous falsetto voice.
sentences.cn: 他降低了他那不相称的假嗓子.

sentences.en: He sang to himself in a soft falsetto.
sentences.cn: 他用柔和的假声自吟自唱。

sentences.en: Instead of natural voice , the performers sing falsetto.
sentences.cn: 演员用假声而不是真声演唱.

sentences.en: Method: Testing F O of lowest true voice, comfortable voice, highest true voice and falsetto voice.
sentences.cn: 方法: 用电子计算机分别测试真声最低音 、 舒适音 、 真声最高音、假声最高音的FO值.

sentences.en: Set an objectively scientific foundation for name, diagnosis, therapy and assessment of mutational falsetto.
sentences.cn: 目的:为变声后“假声”的命名 、 诊断 、 治疗及疗效评价提供科学、客观的理论依据.

sentences.en: Singers of Beijing Opera usually sing falsetto.
The incongruous falsetto voice took on a musing note.
sentences.cn: 那个不相称的假嗓子里带着一种沉思的声调.

trans.tran_cn: 假音，男性女声，假声歌手
